      • translate

        public static java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String prefix,
                                         java.lang.String textToTranslate)
        To translate text has ChatColorCode

        This method will replace "prefix + [chat color key]" to "§ + [chat color key]"

        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix of the chat color key
        textToTranslate - the text you want to translate
        Returns:
        translated text

      • translate

        public static GText translate(java.lang.String prefix,
                              GText textToTranslate)
        To translate text has ChatColorCode

        This method will replace "prefix + [chat color key]" to "§ + [chat color key]"

        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix of the chat color key
        textToTranslate - the text you want to translate
        Returns:
        translated text
